feed.title: Google Cloud: Firestore
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Firestore

entry.content: The database clone feature is now supported at the General Availability (GA) level.
entry.summary: The database clone feature is now supported at the General Availability (GA) level. This feature allows for easier management of databases.
entry.title: Feature: Database Clone Feature Now Generally Available

entry.content: You can now query your databases and update data using the dedicated Gemini CLI extension for Firestore. This feature is available in beta.
entry.summary: Query and update your data using the new Gemini CLI extension for Firestore. Available in beta.
entry.title: Feature: Gemini CLI extension for Firestore

entry.content: Use Query insights to view query performance metrics for your database. This feature is now generally available (GA).
entry.summary: Query insights for Firestore are now generally available. You can use this feature to view query performance metrics for your database.
entry.title: Feature: Query insights now GA

entry.content: You can clone an existing database at a selected timestamp into a new database. This feature is available in Preview.
entry.summary: Clone your existing database to a new database.
entry.title: Feature: Clone Database
